com.camerontec.util.logger.hpl

Class HighPerformanceLoggerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.logger.hpl.HighPerformanceLoggerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHighPerformanceLogEventListener<HighPerformanceLogEvent>, IHighPerformanceLoggerMXBean, ILoggerFactory

    public class HighPerformanceLoggerFactory
extends Object
implements ILoggerFactory, IHighPerformanceLoggerMXBean, IHighPerformanceLogEventListener<HighPerformanceLogEvent>
    Class containing all context associated with the Catalys High Performance Logging subsystem.

    This class also serves directly as a ILoggerFactory and repository of all high performance loggers in the system.

      • createWriter

        protected IHighPerformanceLoggerWriter createWriter()
                                             throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                                    NoSuchMethodException,
                                                    InvocationTargetException,
                                                    IllegalAccessException,
                                                    InstantiationException
        Create a concrete IHighPerformanceLoggerWriter instance.

        The default implementation obtains the log file writer class name from configuration and then instantiates via reflection.

        Returns:
        The concrete high performance log file writer.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - If any of the underlying classes specified via configuration cannot be found.
        NoSuchMethodException - If no appropriate constructor for any of the underlying classes specified via configuration can be found.
        InvocationTargetException - Thrown as a result of instantiating one of the underlying classes specified via configuration.
        InstantiationException - Thrown as a result of instantiating one of the underlying classes specified via configuration.
        IllegalAccessException - Thrown as a result of instantiating one of the underlying classes specified via configuration.

      • append

        public void append(HighPerformanceLogEvent highPerformanceLogEvent)
        Append a high performance log event to be logged.

        This allows for events to be logged outside the context of a HighPerformanceLogger. This is an abnormal use case and is designed for internal usage only.

        Parameters:
        highPerformanceLogEvent - The high performance log event.
